data.prayer: Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Aust-Agder, Norway that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Aust-Agder, Norway
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Aust-Agder.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Aust-Agder, Norway a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Father, we rejoice that you who began a good work in the church of Aust-Agder, Norway will carry it on to completion until the day of Jesus Christ!
data.verse: being confident of this, that he who began a good work in you will carry it on to completion until the day of Christ Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Thai people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Jesus, please give the apostles in Aust-Agder, Norway a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Aust-Agder to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Spirit, train the church of Aust-Agder, Norway to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

location.name: Aust-Agder
location.people_groups_list: Jew, Norwegian-speaking, Persian, Bosniak, Moroccan, Arabic-speaking, Turk
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Jew, Norwegian-speaking (1,300), Persian (21,000), Bosniak (18,000), Moroccan, Arabic-speaking (8,000), Turk (20,000)
